query:
UPDATE tournaments SET
            full_name = $1,
            shortened_name = $2,
            speech_time = $3,
            end_protected_time = $4,
            start_protected_time = $5,
            ad_vocem_time = $6,
            debate_time_slot = $7,
            debate_preparation_time = $8,
            beep_on_speech_end = $9,
            beep_on_protected_time = $10,
            visualize_protected_time = $11
            WHERE id = $12
